Class AlbumController

java.lang.Object
photosfx.AlbumController
public class AlbumController extends Object
The AlbumController class is responsible for managing the album interface in the PhotosFX application. It allows the user to view, add, remove, and manage photos within an album.

This class interacts with the application's data layer to retrieve and modify album and photo information. It also provides feedback to the user through alerts and confirmation dialogs.

FXML elements such as Label, Button, and ImageView are used to display and interact with album data.

Key functionalities include:

  • Displaying the album name and options
  • Adding a new photo to the album
  • Removing a photo from the album
  • Moving or copying a photo to another album

  • Constructor Details

    • AlbumController

      public AlbumController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the AlbumController by setting the current FXML context and populating the album options. This method is called automatically by the JavaFX framework when the FXML file is loaded.

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      Refreshes the display pane to show the current photos in the album. Clears the existing photos and repopulates the display pane with the updated list of photos.

    • showOptions

      public void showOptions(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Displays the photo options when a photo is clicked. Sets the current photo in the data model and updates the photo options label.
      Parameters:
      event - the mouse event triggered by the user

    • updatePhotoOptionsLabel

      public void updatePhotoOptionsLabel()
      Updates the photo options label to reflect the current photo's caption.

    • addPhoto

      public void addPhoto(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Adds a new photo to the current album. Opens a file chooser dialog to select an image file and adds it to the album. Checks for duplicate photos and provides feedback to the user.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the user

    • removePhoto

      public void removePhoto(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Removes the currently selected photo from the album. Displays a confirmation dialog to confirm the deletion.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the user

    • moveOrCopy

      public void moveOrCopy(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Moves or copies the currently selected photo to another album. Displays a choice dialog to select the target album.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the user

    • slideShow

      public void slideShow(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Displays the slideshow view when the "Slideshow" button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the user
